title: Premiere: BEFFROI – Jade
content:
Whilst electro-pop duo BEFFROI (Rori & Valentin) have hardly been prolific with their number of tracks released, everything they’ve put out has been of exceedingly high quality, following a clear quality over quantity ethos.

Their debut, Swim, out through Kitsuné’s Hot Stream compilation clocked up half a million Spotify streams, and the follow-up, Faint, cemented their place as one of the most exciting duos around. Now returning with their third offering, in the form of the bullishly confident Jade, an ode to “lonely souls interacting in hopes of finding instant satisfaction” it deals with the essence of loss and euphoria in scintillating style. Merging elements of the likes of MØ and Broods, Jade manages to feel strikingly elegant whilst also being unnervingly honest.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
